>
[Rhino Hide](/Equipment.aspx?ID=158)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 558 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 resilient [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_ is made from rhinoceros hide. It has an armor check penalty of –1 instead of –3. When you use the [Sudden Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=134) class feat while wearing this armor, your Strike deals an additional 1d8 damage.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include 320 gp of rhinoceros hide (a common material).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Rhino Hide
